title: Mukunda and Arts
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Arabic
description: Menu includes vegetarian burgers, falafel, ice cream, fruit-smoothies; of which all can be made vegan. House is on stilts over the ocean. Only one larger outdoor table. Also sells handcraft and offers skateboard lessons and hairdos. From Aqua Lounge water taxi walk 5 min east.
